message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a fantastic deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?

I understand you're willing to go down to $105, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession as well. I can offer you the product for $108. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll find it's still a great deal.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'll try to meet you in the middle again. I can do $106 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle again, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $109. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's still a great deal.
